original_title: The Talk of the Town- Indian rupee in SL to aid economic growth?- MP TNPF Gajendrakumar Ponnambalam
original_body_lines: The Talk of the Town- Indian rupee in SL to aid economic growth?- MP TNPF Gajendrakumar Ponnambalam in conversation with Faraz Shauketaly
The Regional Conference of the Charted Accountants of Sri Lanka was held on Thurday (27) in Jaffna.
